title: SC EP:62 A hunter's encounter
itunes:title: SC EP:62 A hunter's encounter
description: Tonight we speak to a hunter from Pennsylvania. While hunting he had a chance encounter with Sasquatch. The creature and him came face-to-face on a trail, and the encounter changed his life. Listen as our guest describes what he saw, how he felt and how this has changed his life.
